alert.note: Alert for Kershaw; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 23 at 6:46PM EDT until July 23 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central South Carolina, including the following areas, Kershaw and Richland. * WHEN...Until 800 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 646 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Columbia, Forest Acres, Camden, Dentsville, Elgin, Arcadia Lakes, Lake Carolina, Villages at Sandhill, Killian, Sesquicentennial State Park, Lugoff, Woodfield, Goodale State Park, Blythewood, Pine Grove Fire Station, Cedar Creek Fire Station, North Towne Square Shopping Center, Upper Richland Fire Station and Woodward Airfield. - This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 69 and 102. Interstate 77 between mile markers 14 and 29. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
